pageContext.claim: “I am going to trust the intelligence that I'm putting there, but I will say this: my intelligence people, if they said in fact that Iran is a wonderful kindergarten, I disagree with them 100 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: The Worldwide Threat Assessment issued on Jan. 29 by the Intelligence Community did not say Iran was "wonderful kindergarten." It described Iran as a dangerous foe, prepared to launch cyber attacks against the United States. But it also said that Iran for the moment was abiding by the nuclear deal that Trump quit -- and assessment at odds with his rhetoric.
